title: Full-Stack GenAI Developer
description:
Role Mission



We are seeking an elite Full-Stack GenAI Developer to design, build, and scale our next-generation agentic workflows. You are not just a coder; you are a systems thinker capable of bridging the gap between local LLM orchestration (Ollama/Jan.ai) and enterprise-grade cloud environments (GCP/AWS). Your mission is to build autonomous, self-healing systems that leverage the Model Context Protocol (MCP) and advanced graph-based reasoning to solve complex business challenges.



Technical Stack & Requirements



1. AI & Orchestration (The Core)



Agentic Frameworks: Expert-level proficiency in LangChain and LangGraph for stateful, multi-agent orchestration.Model Context Protocol (MCP): Hands-on experience implementing MCP to standardize tool-calling and context sharing across diverse models.Local & Open Ecosystems: Deep familiarity with local inference and development platforms including Ollama, Dify, Jan.ai, and Gorilla.Model Interoperability: Experience working with OpenClaw (or similar self-hosted agent runtimes) to execute system-level tasks via natural language.



2. Full-Stack Engineering & Cloud



Languages: Mastery of Python (FastAPI/Flask) for backend logic and AI integration.Cloud Infrastructure: Competency in Google Cloud Platform (GCP) and AWS, specifically regarding Vertex AI, Lambda/Cloud Functions, and secure IAM/VPC configurations.Workspace Integration: Ability to build custom apps and automations within Google Workspace (Apps Script, Gmail/Drive APIs).



3. Data Extraction & RPA



Web Scraping: Advanced experience with Playwright, Selenium, or BeautifulSoup, including bypass techniques for sophisticated anti-bot measures.RPA (Robotic Process Automation): Building robust, browser-based or desktop-based automations that mimic human interaction where APIs are unavailable.API Architect: Designing and consuming complex REST/GraphQL APIs with a focus on rate-limiting, error handling, and data integrity.



Key Responsibilities



Architect Agentic Workflows: Design state machines using LangGraph that can reason, loop, and self-correct during complex multi-step tasks.Hardware-to-Cloud Bridging: Manage the lifecycle of models from local testing (Ollama) to production deployment on 
tomated Data Pipelines: Build resilient scrapers and RPA bots that feed real-time data into vector databases or agentic memory.System Integration: Use MCP to connect AI agents to internal tools, databases, and third-party SaaS platforms seamlessly.



Qualifications



5+ years of Full-Stack development experience.Proven track record of deploying production-grade AI agents (not just "wrappers").Deep understanding of RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) and vector database optimization.A "Builder" mindset: You contribute to open-source or have a portfolio of complex "side projects" that demonstrate your curiosity.



The Selection Process: Technical "Gauntlet"



Our vetting process involves a live coding challenge where you will be asked to:



Connect an AI agent to a live API using 
sign a brief LangGraph state machine to handle a multi-step research 
bug a failing web scraper in a containerized environment.



Work Environment



This is a fully virtual position offering flexibility to work from anywhere while maintaining collaborative relationships with tea
mbers and clients across various time zones.

Application Process



To be considered for this position, please visit: 



This position requires candidates to successfully complete our comprehensive evaluation process, which includes technical assessments and multiple interview stages to ensure the best fit for both the role and our organizational culture.

title: AI-Proficient Virtual Assistant – AI Tools & Automation Specialist
description:
We are looking for a highly skilled, AI-native Virtual Assistant who lives and breathes artificial intelligence. This is NOT a traditional VA role — we need someone with proven, hands-on proficiency in the latest AI tools, platforms, and workflows. If you're still doing things manually that AI can do in seconds, this role is not for you.



??????????????????????????????

WHAT YOU'LL DO

??????????????????????????????



• Leverage AI tools daily to handle content creation, research, data analysis, scheduling,
 management, social media, and administrative tasks at 10x speed and quality

• Build and manage AI-driven automations using tools like Make (Integromat), Zapier, n8n, or Claude to streamline business workflows

• Create high-quality content (written, visual, video) using AI tools — from drafting to final polish

• Conduct deep research and competitive analysis using AI-assisted research tools

• Manage and optimize AI chatbots, customer service automation, and lead generation funnels

• Prompt engineer across multiple LLMs to get the best outputs for various business needs

• Stay ahead of the curve — you proactively discover, test, and implement new AI tools and updates as they are released



??????????????????????????????

REQUIRED AI TOOL PROFICIENCY (Must-Haves)

??????????????????????????????



You MUST have real, demonstrable experience with the following:



? LLMs & AI Assistants: ChatGPT (GPT-5.2), Claude (4.6, Opus), Google Gemini 3.0, Perplexity AI, DeepSeek V3, Grok — you know when and why to use each one and can compare their strengths



? AI Image & Design: Midjourney V6/V7, DALL-E 3 (ChatGPT image gen), Google Nano Banana, Flux, Adobe Firefly, Canva AI (Magic Studio), Ideogram 2.0, Reve, Freepik AI



? AI Video: Runway Gen-4.5 (Act-One), Kling AI 2.6, OpenAI Sora 2, Google Veo 3.1, Luma Ray3, HeyGen, Synthesia, CapCut AI, Wan (open-source), Invideo AI



? AI Writing & SEO: Jasper, SurferSEO (Surfer AI), Frase, Writesonic, Copy.ai, ChatGPT for long-form — you understand content optimization, SERP analysis, and AI-assisted editorial workflows



? AI Automation & Agents: Make (Integromat), Zapier (AI actions & Central), n8n (agentic workflows), Lindy.ai, Relevance AI, Vellum — building multi-step automations, AI agents, and workflows that connect apps and APIs



? AI Voice, Audio & Transcription: ElevenLabs (voice cloning & TTS), OpenAI Whisper, Otter.ai, Fireflies.ai, Descript, Notta, Fish Audio — for voice generation, meeting transcription, and audio editing



? AI Coding Assistants: Cursor, GitHub Copilot, Windsurf (Codeium), Claude Code, Replit Agent, v0 by Vercel, Bolt.new, Lovable — ability to build simple apps, scripts, automations, and internal tools with AI assistance



? AI Data & Analytics: Using AI (ChatGPT Advanced Data Analysis, Claude, Gemini) to analyze spreadsheets, create dashboards, generate reports, and extract actionable insights from complex data



? Prompt Engineering: Advanced prompt crafting, chain-of-thought prompting, system prompts, structured output techniques, multi-turn context management, and knowing how to get the best from each model



??????????????????????????????

WHAT SETS THE IDEAL CANDIDATE APART

??????????????????????????????



• You have an "AI-first" mindset — your default is to find an AI solution before doing anything manually

• You follow AI news daily (X/Twitter AI communities, YouTube channels, newsletters like Ben's Bites, The Neuron, The Rundown AI, etc.)

• You can show a portfolio or examples of work where AI tools were central to the output

• You've built automations or AI agent workflows that saved significant time

• You understand AI agents, RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation), agentic workflows, and how to use AI APIs

• You're comfortable with no-code/low-code platforms and can ship fast

• You are a self-starter who doesn't need to be micromanaged — you see a problem, find the AI tool, and solve it



??????????????????????????????

NON-NEGOTIABLES

??????????????????????????????



???? Do NOT apply if you only have surface-level AI knowledge (e.g., you've "used ChatGPT a few times") - It will be incredibly challenging if not!

???? Do NOT apply if you cannot demonstrate real outputs created with AI tools

???? We will test your AI proficiency during the interview process — you will be given real tasks to complete using AI



??????????????????????????????

TO APPLY

??????????????????????????????



In your application, please include:

1. A brief summary of the AI tools you use daily and how you use them

2. One specific example of a workflow or automation you built using AI

3. Links to any AI-generated content you've created (writing, images, videos, apps, etc.)

4. Answer this: "What is the most underrated AI tool right now and why?"



We're building a fast-moving, AI-driven operation and need someone who can keep up. If AI excites you and you're constantly experimenting with the latest tools, we want to hear from you.

title: Project Launch/Manager VA / Integrator (Help Me Launch My First Digital Product)

?? Applications without the test video will be IGNORED

PH or similar timezone

title: Dark Web information - search only
description:
More information available on request.

Our company has been trading successfully for over a decade. We have recently been made aware of potential concerns that competitors may be attempting to obtain sensitive information through illicit online sources.

We are therefore seeking an individual with strong expertise in deep and dark web research who can conduct a thorough review of publicly and privately accessible channels to identify what, if any, information may be circulating.

The objective is to understand whether  sensitive data has been exposed, undervalued, or made easily accessible without our knowledge, as this may require internal restructuring or changes to our data-protection practices.

A one-off fee will be agreed and paid upon delivery of a comprehensive report outlining any relevant findings.

title: Customer Support Specialist (Email Only) – Dropshipping
description:

s using:

s before sending

title: Construction Administrator
description:
I am a general contractor in Phoenix Arizona, USA. I manage around 3 projects at a time, both residential and commercial and 7 figures of revenue per year. I am looking for someone with a deep understanding of construction and finances to be an administrator for our team. 



We need someone who will help my team stay organized in contractor foreman, an application used to send quotes, invoices, keep track of receipts and finances, labor hours, etc. I also need someone with an understanding of construction who can help us order materials to ensure that my crew has what they need to complete a job.



This is a smaller company, so the responsibilities may grow as we get bigger. My team speaks spanish so if you speak spanish, that can be helpful, but not required. 



I am looking for someone very experience, and will pay accordingly. Depending on experience this job can pay $6 per hour or more.

title: Customer Support for eCom Jewelry Brand
description:
Join the team building the world’s best Cuban Link chain for everyday life. 



We’re looking for people who genuinely care about customers, take ownership, and want to deliver an experience most brands don’t.



At BALANZI, you’ll be responsible for turning problems into trust and making sure every customer walks away feeling respected, taken care of, and confident that we stand behind our word.



Start here: 



Watch this short video from the founders to understand how we think about customer experience, integrity, and why support is a moat for our brand.



Role Overview 



- Role: Customer Support (Junior) 

- Location: Fully remote

- Schedule: Monday-Saturday (6 days/week) with flexible hours

- Compensation: $500/month (+$100 if you work Sundays, optional)



We put a premium on authenticity and integrity. We don’t want corporate personas or scripted support, we want real people who show up as themselves and care about doing the right thing.



This role is about thinking proactively, putting yourself in the customer’s shoes, and going above and beyond by default, not just reacting to tickets.



Integrity here means a “pick up the trash” mindset. If something is wrong, no matter how small or who caused it, you fix it without being asked.



The goal is simple: customers should walk away thinking, “Why isn’t every brand like this?” Feeling confident, respected, and genuinely taken care of.



When someone buys from BALANZI, they should feel one thing above all else: we stand behind our word.



Who This Is Really For



- You thrive in high standards

- You take REAL ownership 

- You learn fast and figure things out

- You perform best when the stakes are real 

- You care about building something meaningful 

- You’re willing to get your hands dirty to move the mission forward



Our Core Values



The right person for this role will connect deeply with our values, live them daily, and understand why they’re essential for building something great.



No Compromises – You never compromise on anything, from product to customer experience.



Ultimate Perseverance – You don’t stop. The challenge doesn’t matter; there’s always a solution to a problem. 



Extreme Ownership – You take full ownership. You care about the details and deliver work you’re proud to put your name on.



If these values don’t feel like a natural fit, please do not apply. 



Main Responsibilities: 



- Handle all customer communication in Gorgias across
, SMS, Instagram DMs,
 messages, and social comments



- Maintain first response time under 1 hour and resolution within 2-4 hours whenever possible



- Process refunds, exchanges, and warranty claims accurately, including cases covered under our Lifetime Money-Back Guarantee



- Respond to Trustpilot reviews, on-site reviews, and public customer feedback in a way that builds trust and reinforces brand credibility



- Communicate directly with our 3PL to resolve fulfillment issues, stock questions, mis-shipments, and delivery problems



- Work with carriers and manufacturers to resolve shipping delays, lost packages, and transit-related issues



- Monitor and manage paid ad comments by answering questions, addressing concerns, and escalating issues when needed



- Proactively identify recurring customer issues, bottlenecks, or risks and flag them before they become problems



- Operate with an ownership-first mindset, fixing issues without being asked and ensuring customers always feel taken care of



Prior Experience / Skills



- No experience required. We hire for potential, not experience

- What matters most is how you perform during the 14-day trial

- Familiarity with Shopify, Gorgias (or other help desks), or working with a 3PL is a plus, but not required



About Us 



BALANZI exists to build the world’s best Cuban Link chain for everyday life - so that men can move through life feeling confident, without ever needing to take off their chain or change who they are.



Founded in 2020, we didn’t start with a big mission. We chased money, sold products we didn’t believe in, and eventually realized we hated what we were building. So we scrapped everything and kept only one thing: Cuban Links - the only product our customers truly loved.



Over the last 12 months, we’ve rebuilt BALANZI from the ground up: redesigned products, raised our quality standards, refined our positioning, and committed fully to becoming the #1 destination for Cuban Links.



Today, we’re a small, passionate team focused on excellence, long-term thinking, and building a brand we’re truly proud of; never compromising on product, customer experience, or our team.



Why Work For BALANZI? 



- Your work has real impact, and it will directly shape BALANZI and its future

- You work directly with the founders, not buried under layers of management

- You’ll have real ownership, autonomy, and the ability to move the needle fast

- You’ll grow faster here than in any traditional environment 



You’ll join a team with high standards, no bureaucracy, and a clear mission we believe in



If this gets you fired up, then click below and apply now.

title: INSURANCE AGENCY TECH AUTOMATION & SYSTEMS MANAGER

/social metrics improving, 10+ tasks automated

---



WHO WE WANT



### MUST HAVE:

- Social media management (Canva, content creation, scheduling)

-
 marketing (campaigns, deliverability, analytics)

- Strong written English



**Mindset:**

- Proactive problem-solver (fix issues before CEO knows they exist)

- Ownership mentality (this is YOUR system to manage)

- Data-driven (use analytics to guide decisions)

- Detail-oriented (one missed lead = lost revenue)



**Infrastructure:**

- Reliable internet (10+ Mbps)

- Backup internet connection (required)

- UPS or generator (2-4 hours backup power)



### HIGHLY PREFERRED (Major Advantage):



**Current/former LAVA Automation employee** (you know our exact systems)  

**3+ years US insurance agency experience**  

**Agency Zoom expert** (daily use 2+ years)  

**EZLynx proficiency**  

**Working night shift now and want to escape** (we're your exit plan)  



---



## COMPENSATION & GROWTH



**Starting:** $7-8/hour based on experience  

- $7/hour = 3-4 years automation + some insurance

- $7.50/hour = 4-5 years automation + strong insurance CRM

- $8/hour = 5+ years + proven Agency Zoom/EZLynx expert



**90-Day Review:** Raise to $7.50-8.50/hour for strong performance  



**Long-term Growth Path:**

- Year 1: Systems Manager ($7-8/hr)

- Year 2: Senior Architect ($8.50-9/hr)

- Year 3: Marketing Tech Manager ($9-10/hr)

- Year 4-5: Director of Operations ($10-12/hr, managing 2-3 VAs)



**Plus:** 13th month bonus, 10 days PTO, 5 sick days, Philippine holidays paid



**Payment:** Bi-weekly via PayPal, Wise, or Payoneer



---



ABOUT US



**Weer Insurance Group** - Independent insurance agency serving commercial clients since 2015.



**Our Clients:** Contractors, trucking companies, restaurants, bars  

**Our Carriers:** 30+ carriers (Hartford, Travelers, Liberty Mutual, Progressive, etc.)  

**Our Team:** CEO, 4 producers, 1 account manager, office manager, 3 VAs (operations)



**Your Role:** Own the tech stack so the team can focus on selling



**Tech Stack:** Agency Zoom (CRM), EZLynx (rating/apps), Zapier (automation), Social Pilot, Google Workspace



---



## WHY THIS IS DIFFERENT



### 1. DAY SHIFT = LIFE-CHANGING



If you're working night shift now:

- Your health is suffering

- You're missing your family

- You know this isn't sustainable



**We're offering the same work at normal hours. Sleep at night. Live your life.**



### 2. DIRECT CEO RELATIONSHIP



Not one of 300 VAs at outsourcing company. You work directly with Scott (CEO). He knows your name, sees your impact, hears your ideas.



### 3. OWNERSHIP, NOT TASK EXECUTION



You won't just "do what you're told." You'll **own the automation infrastructure** and make it excellent. See problems, fix them. Spot opportunities, implement them.



### 4. REAL CAREER GROWTH



Clear path from $7/hour ? $12/hour over 3-5 years. Potential to manage other VAs. This is a 5-10 year career, not an 18-month gig.



### 5. MEASURABLE IMPACT



Your automations directly generate clients and revenue. You'll see concrete results: "Your workflow captured $50K in new business this quarter."



---



## HOW TO APPLY



*
:** 



**Subject Line:** "Tech Automation - [Your Name] - [Years Exp] - [Current Situation]"



Example: *"Tech Automation - Maria Santos - 5 Years - LAVA Employee Seeking Day Shift"*



---



### INCLUDE IN YOUR APPLICATION:



**1. PORTFOLIO (Required)**



Show 3-5 Zapier workflows you've built. For each:

- What systems it connects

- What it does

- Business impact (time saved, revenue generated, errors prevented)



Format: Screenshots, Google Doc, or Loom video walkthrough



---



**2. ANSWER THESE 5 QUESTIONS (Required)**



**Q1:** A Zap connecting Agency Zoom to Google Sheets suddenly stops working. What are your first 5 troubleshooting steps?



**Q2:** You notice website lead volume dropped 60% this week. What are 3 possible causes and how would you diagnose?



**Q3:**
 open rate is 12% (industry benchmark: 18%). What are 3 specific things you'd test to improve it?



**Q4:** Show us an example of a social media post you'd create for a commercial insurance agency serving contractors. Include copy + describe the graphic.



**Q5:** You notice producers spend 3 hours/week manually checking renewals in Agency Zoom. How would you automate this? Be specific.



---



**3. ONE CASE STUDY (Required)**



Describe one automation/optimization project you completed:

- **Problem:** What was broken/inefficient?

- **Solution:** What did you build?

- **Results:** Measurable impact (with numbers)



(
words)



---



**4. INFRASTRUCTURE CHECK**



Confirm you have:

- [ ] Primary internet 10+ Mbps

- [ ] Backup internet connection

- [ ] UPS or generator (2+ hours)

- [ ] Available for 9 AM - 5 PM Philippines Time, Monday-Friday



---



**5. REFERENCES**



Provide 2 professional references:

- Name, company, relationship,

- What they can speak to about your work



---



**6. AVAILABILITY**



- Can you start within 2-4 weeks?

- Why are you interested in this role specifically?

- Current situation (employed/available/notice period needed)



---



## WHAT HAPPENS NEXT



**Step 1:** We review applications (3-5 days)



**Step 2:** Technical interview (60 min) - Live problem-solving, portfolio deep-dive



**Step 3:** Work style interview (45 min) - Scenarios, communication assessment, your questions



**Step 4:** Reference check



**Step 5:** Offer letter



**Timeline:** 2-3 weeks from application to start



---



##  QUICK FAQ



**Q: I'm currently employed. Can I interview while working?**  

A: Yes. We'll schedule around your availability and keep it confidential.



**Q: I have automation experience but no insurance background. Should I apply?**  

A: Yes, if you're a quick learner and have 3+ years of strong automation work.



**Q: Can I work part-time?**  

A: No. This is full-time only (40 hrs/week).



**Q: What if I can't start for 4-6 weeks?**  

A: That's fine. Mention your notice period in the application.



**Q: Do you provide equipment?**  

A: No computer/hardware. We provide all software subscriptions (Zapier, Canva, etc.).



**Q: How is performance measured?**  

A: Clear KPIs: automation uptime, lead capture rate,
 metrics, CEO time saved, proactive improvements.



---



## NOT FOR YOU IF:



You need constant supervision  

You want part-time or flexible hours  

You need same-timezone communication  

You're a beginner learning automation  

You can't commit to Philippines day shift  

You wait to be told what to do (not proactive)  



---



## ? PERFECT FOR YOU IF:



 You're burnt out from night shift and want your life back  

You're experienced (3-5+ years automation/insurance)  

You're proactive (fix problems before being told)  

 You want ownership (not just task execution)  

 You're building a 5+ year career (not looking for temp gig)  

 You want direct relationship with CEO  



---



##READY TO ESCAPE NIGHT SHIFT



**Same insurance work. Better pay. Normal hours. Real career.**



This is your exit from the night shift burnout cycle.



**APPLY NOW:**



*
:** [YOUR
 HERE]  

**Subject:** "Tech Automation - [Your Name] - [Years Exp] - [Current Situation]"



**Include:** Portfolio, 5 question answers, case study, references, availability



---



**We review applications within 3-5 business days.**



**Questions?**
 with "Question - Tech Role" in subject line.



---



**Weer Insurance Group**  

Independent Insurance Agency | Chicago, Illinois  

*Equal opportunity employer*



---



**RECLAIM YOUR SLEEP. BUILD YOUR CAREER. APPLY TODAY.**

title: Real Estate Acquisitions (+Bonuses!)
description:
Real Estate Acquisitions Specialist (Remote)



About Us

Price Real Estate Investments is a multi-market U.S. based real estate investment company focused on acquiring off-market properties directly from homeowners. We specialize in building strong relationships with sellers, negotiating with them, and closing deals virtually. Our team is fully remote, but our impact is nationwide — and we’re growing quickly.



We’re looking for an experienced Real Estate Acquisitions Specialist to join our acquisitions team. This role is critical to our business: you’ll be speaking directly with homeowners, negotiating terms, and guiding sellers through the contract signing process. If you’ve personally made offers to sellers and closed contracts over the phone, this is an opportunity to put your skills to work in a high-energy, professional environment.



Compensation

$10/hour USD base pay



Plus Monthly Contract Bonuses for getting offers accepted:

• Bronze: 2 signed contracts = $500 bonus

• Silver: 3 signed contracts = $1,000 bonus

• Gold: 4 signed contracts = $1,500 bonus

• Platinum: 5+ signed contracts = $2,000 bonus



On-target earnings can range from $2,500–$3,500+ per month depending on performance. Pay dates are on the 1st and 15th of each month.



We believe in rewarding results. Our top performers earn meaningful bonuses based on closed contracts and consistent production.



Schedule

Full-time, Monday to Friday

9:00 AM – 6:00 PM CST

Remote position, work from your own secure setup



What You’ll Be Doing

- Engage with homeowners (seller leads), build authentic rapport, and manage conversations with professionalism

- Follow a proven acquisitions script while sounding natural and confident

- Ask strong follow-up questions to uncover seller motivation and property condition

- Make verbal offers, negotiate price and terms, and walk sellers through agreements using DocuSign

- Handle objections effectively and push deals forward toward signed contracts

- Maintain organized notes, offers, and seller updates in our CRM

- Collaborate closely with the acquisitions team and leadership



What It Takes to Succeed Here

- Relentless Follow-Up: Sellers don’t always respond the first time — or the second. You know how to stay persistent with calls, texts, and follow-ups until you get an answer. Nothing slips through the cracks on your watch.

- Extreme Attention to Detail: Every call, every note, every update gets logged correctly in the CRM. You don’t miss details, and you take pride in keeping your pipeline organized. If you’ve ever been called meticulous or “on top of everything,” this is where you’ll shine.

- Closer’s Mentality: You’re not just reading a script — you know how to listen, build rapport, and guide sellers toward a decision. You thrive on negotiation, handle objections with confidence, and create win-win agreements that get signed.

- Driven by Results: You measure success by contracts closed. You hold yourself to high standards and push to hit — and exceed — your targets consistently. You’re motivated by performance and driven by the satisfaction of closing successful deals.

- Resilient Problem-Solver: Whether it’s a tough seller, a pricing objection, or a complicated situation, you don’t freeze — you find solutions and move the deal forward. Challenges are part of the role, and you thrive in solving them under pressure.



Requirements

- Minimum 2+ years of experience in real estate acquisitions or seller negotiations

- Proven track record of closing real estate deals and securing signed contracts

- Excellent English communication skills (spoken and written)

- Confidence and professionalism on the phone; ability to build trust and rapport quickly

- Familiarity with real estate terms like ARV, repairs, inspection, contingencies, etc.

- Strong work ethic, coachability, and ability to follow scripts while sounding natural

- Proficiency with CRMs and outbound dialers

- Reliable high-speed internet, updated computer, and a quiet workspace



What We’re Looking For

- A confident, friendly, and persuasive communicator who thrives on results

- Someone who is organized, detail-oriented, and relentless in follow-up

- A professional with the drive to close contracts and grow with a fast-moving team



Why Join Us?

- Competitive pay with structured bonuses

- Real opportunities for growth in a professional investment company

- Work remotely with a team that supports your success

- A chance to close real deals, make a real impact, and develop long-term career skills in acquisitions



At Price Real Estate Investments, acquisitions is the heartbeat of our business. You’ll be in the front seat, driving growth and learning the strategies that power real deals across multiple U.S. markets.



How to Apply: (Read Carefully – Incomplete Applications Will Be Ignored)

-
 us at: 

- Subject line: Real Estate Acquisitions Application – OJPH

- Attach your resume with relevant real estate or sales experience

- Include a 1–2 minute audio or video introduction about yourself and experience.



Only applicants who follow all instructions will be considered.

title: Virtual Assistant (Remote – Philippines)
description:
Compensation: $4-5/hr

Type: Full-time

Schedule: 40 hours/week with availability within 7:00 AM to 7:00 PM US Hours

Tools: TenantCloud and Basic QuickBooks familiarity is a plus



Role Overview

We are seeking a highly organized and proactive Virtual Assistant to provide high-level administrative support to a busy executive. The ideal candidate is detail-oriented, self-motivated, and able to perform effectively in a fast-paced virtual environment. This role requires strong communication skills, exceptional attention to detail, and the ability to anticipate and respond to the executive’s needs.





Responsibilities

• Calendar management and scheduling including confirmations, reminders, follow ups, reschedules, and keeping everything organized.

• Inbox and communication support including organizing and prioritizing messages, drafting replies, following up on open items, and ensuring responses are completed.

• Travel logistics including booking flights and hotels, tracking confirmations, handling changes, and producing clean itineraries.

• Customer support through chat and
 including resolving issues quickly, documenting outcomes, and escalating when needed.

• Research properties in specific areas, build organized lead lists, and conduct outreach. 

• Personal online tasks including ordering, scheduling, coordination, research, and follow through.

• TenantCloud support including tenant and property records, rent status, leasing leads, and documentation.

• Basic QuickBooks support including simple categorization, invoices, payment tracking, pulling basic reports, and keeping everything organized.



Qualifications

• Proven experience in Virtual Assistant, Admin Support and similar roles. 

• Exceptional English communication skills (written & verbal).

• Detail oriented and highly organized. 

• Ability to work independently and stay organized under minimal supervision

• Not afraid to ask lots of questions early to hit the ground running. 

• Proactive mindset, you anticipate needs and take action

•  Proficiency with Google Workspace or Microsoft Office

• Must be available to work full-time during US business hours

• Strong understanding of confidentiality and professionalism



How to Apply (Important – Read Carefully)

We do not want generic copy-paste applications. To apply, please send:



1. Your Resume (PDF preferred).



2. Loom Video (under 5 minutes): Introduce yourself and answer:

3. Submit your application to:

title: SOCIAL MEDIA CONTENT PRODUCER + VIDEO EDITOR
description:
? PART-TIME JOB POST: SOCIAL MEDIA CONTENT PRODUCER + VIDEO EDITOR

(Podcast Repurposing + Sales Content + YouTube + Reels)



Part-Time | Remote (Philippines Preferred) | Long-Term Role

Must collaborate closely with our Executive VA



About the Business



We are a physician-led lifestyle medicine brand with both a clinical and coaching division. We produce high-value educational content weekly through a video podcast, membership, and seasonal challenges.



The founder creates long-form video content. Your job is to turn that content into a complete social media ecosystem AND create original sales-focused content that drives revenue.



This is not a basic VA role. This is a creative producer role for someone who understands content, hooks, branding, and short-form performance.



The #1 Goal of This Role



To make our content perform and convert.



You will:



repurpose long-form podcast episodes into short-form content



create new sales-based social media content that supports our current offers



maintain a polished brand aesthetic



ensure YouTube and podcast content looks clean and professional



Hours / Workload



5–10 hours/week



Flexible hours (work can be batched)



Must hit deadlines consistently



The founder often records 3 podcast episodes at a time, so work can be completed on a flexible schedule as long as deliverables are ready by deadline.



Weekly Responsibilities

1. Podcast Repurposing Pipeline



For each podcast episode, you will:



pull the Riverside recording or access from Google Drive



generate transcript (AI tools allowed)



create polished show notes + episode descriptions (ChatGPT allowed, must be edited)



upload transcripts + show notes into shared Google Drive folder (organized by episode)



maintain organized asset folders so our podcast producer has everything needed



2. YouTube Upload + Optimization



For each episode you will:



upload full video podcast to YouTube



write SEO-friendly title and description



add links, hashtags, tags, and formatting



create and upload a professional YouTube thumbnail in Canva



ensure content is organized properly for easy publishing



3. Short-Form Video Creation (Opus Clips Required)



You will turn long-form podcast episodes into polished short-form clips.



Responsibilities include:



upload long-form video into Opus Clips



select best clips for retention and engagement



clean captions and formatting



tighten pacing (remove awkward pauses, dead space)



add hook overlays and CTA overlays



export correctly formatted for:



Instagram Reels



 Reels



YouTube Shorts



Expected output:



5–8 polished clips per episode (minimum)



4. Social Media Sales Content Creation (Creative Brain Required)



In addition to repurposing podcasts, you will also create original sales-based content to support current offers such as:



membership enrollment



seasonal challenges



evergreen products



You will create:



reel ideas and hooks



post concepts and carousel ideas



CTA-driven content prompts



story sequences and sales story scripts



promo-style captions and call-to-action content



This requires strong marketing instincts and a creative mind.



5. Long-Form Podcast Video Editing / Cleanup



You will audit and improve the long-form podcast videos as needed.



Responsibilities include:



review podcast recordings for quality



trim awkward starts/stops



remove dead space when needed



ensure clean beginning/end and professional presentation



flag any issues for the founder (audio/video concerns)



You do NOT need to create cinematic edits — but you must ensure content looks polished and professional.



6. Brand Aesthetic + Consistency



You must maintain a clean, cohesive brand aesthetic:



consistent fonts/colors/templates



consistent tone and messaging



strong hook formatting



modern, polished look



Collaboration Requirement



You will work closely with our Executive VA to ensure:



content supports weekly/monthly sales priorities (“what are we selling this week?”)



deliverables are posted/scheduled properly



assets are stored and organized in Drive



deadlines are met for podcast producer and marketing schedule



Tools You Must Be Comfortable With



Required:



Opus Clips (or similar)



Canva (thumbnails + overlays)



Google Drive organization



YouTube Studio



ChatGPT (for repurposing + descriptions)



Riverside or downloading long-form recordings



Preferred:



Kajabi blog posting



SEO knowledge and optimization



Meta Business Suite formatting



Required Skills



Strong English writing skills



Strong editing instincts for short-form performance



Ability to identify hooks and create engaging content



Good aesthetic + design sense



Strong organization and deadline reliability



Comfortable working independently with minimal oversight



Knowledge of health/wellness/MD coaching preferred



Important Brand Rules



No medical advice



No medical claims



No promises



Founder sign-off tone must remain consistent



Compensation



Part-time role: 5–10 hours/week

Pay based on skill level and speed.

We are open to hourly or monthly retainer.



How to Apply



Please submit:



Short introduction



Relevant experience (especially podcast repurposing and reels editing)



Tools you have used (Opus Clips, Canva, YouTube, ChatGPT)



Links to your work:



reels/shorts you edited



thumbnails you created



sales captions or content you’ve written



Your hourly rate



Weekly availability



Applications without examples will not be considered.

Sam Neumann

????

How to Apply

Looking forward to your result!

title: YouTube Long-Form Editor
description:
I’m on a mission to create world-class educational content that helps people to start and monetise their personal brand online. I’m passionate about this because so many people have knowledge and experiences that need to be shared.

 

Location: Remote

Commitment: Part-Time to Full-Time (2 videos/week)

Compensation: Dependent on experience ($1000 - $1,500 per month)



Please Read Before Applying

This role is only for a high-level, YouTube-first video editor. Please only apply if you have a portfolio ready that shows you can edit to the standard we’re looking for.



About the Role

We're looking for a highly-skilled Video Editor who is passionate about storytelling, loves YouTube, and wants to collaborate long-term to grow a channel focused on content creation and sharing the behind-the-scenes of building a business.



You’ll work closely with the creator (Joe Gannon) in a newly formed Brand Team to publish 2 YouTube videos per week - one a talking-head educational video and the other may be a vlog.



What You'll Do

- Edit 2x long-form YouTube videos per week (length of video TBD)

- Own the entire post-production process: editing, pacing, b-roll, graphics, colour, sound

- Own the production calendar and schedule to ensure a consistent posting time for our audience (we will obsess over how to create a community)

- Help evolve the visual style of the channel

- Occasionally support the wider business on client work (editing YouTube videos, podcasts, or short-form clips) and also wider marketing promo videos for the business

- Stay sharp on creator trends, YouTube content pacing, storytelling styles



My Channel 



You're a Great Fit If You...

- Can emulate educational channels like Ali Abdaal, Shan Hanif, Sahil Bloom and Jay Clouse. For vlogs I like Mr. FourToEight and Sahil Bloom (before he hired a videographer)

- Take creative initiative - not just a task-taker, but a storytelling partner

- Are highly organized and meet deadlines with ease

- Want to grow with a personal brand long-term and take ownership of your work



Success Metrics / KPIs

- 2x videos delivered weekly, on time and within brand standards

- Increasing creative alignment with the brand’s evolving style

- Improved retention through better pacing, hook delivery, and storytelling

- Proactive input during ideation and thumbnail conversations

- Organization: clear file management, streamlined workflows



If interested apply to this link: 



I look forward to hearing from you - thank you for your time!

title: Executive Assistant (AI-Powered)
description:
Summary

Executive Assistant (AI-Powered)

Part-time freelance | 10–15 hours/week | Flexible hours



Work directly with the CEO of a fast-growing personal brand agency.



About the Role

We’re hiring a high-agency, AI-powered Executive Assistant to work directly with the CEO of a fast-growing personal branding company.



You’ll support an entrepreneurial founder who:

- Moves fast

- Thinks out loud

- Is building a multi-layered business (agency, cohorts, and content ecosystem)



Your job is to buy back the CEO’s time, build simple systems, and ensure the right things happen without friction.



You’ll need to be:

- Comfortable in fast-paced environments

- Proactive and solution-oriented

- Skilled with modern AI tools

- Calm, organised, and systems-focused



Your core purpose is to support the CEO so he can do his best work—strategy, relationships, and original content.



About the Business

Our company includes:

- A premium done-for-you personal brand agency

- A quarterly online personal branding programme

- A growing personal brand and content ecosystem



Who You’ll Work With

- You’ll work directly with the CEO and collaborate with the Operations Manager.



Your role is to:

- Remove administrative friction

- Build lightweight systems

- Keep priorities moving forward

- Ensure the CEO stays focused on high-impact work

- Spot when tasks drift or stall

- Act as a calm, organised second brain



Key Responsibilities

- Executive & Founder Support

- Calendar and scheduling support

- Inbox triage and follow-ups

- Task tracking and reminders

- Helping maintain focus and routine



Operations & Systems

- Build simple systems in Notion, Google Drive, etc.

- Create checklists, templates, and workflows



Document processes

-  Support the Operations Manager with ad-hoc tasks

- AI-Powered Execution

- Use AI tools to speed up research and admin

 -Draft
s, documents, and summaries

- Build small automations or workflows

- Constantly ask: “How can this be done faster or smarter?”



What This Role Is Like

We’re looking for someone who:

- Says “I’ll figure it out”

- Is comfortable with ambiguity

- Enjoys building systems

- Takes ownership without constant direction



What Success Looks Like

- The CEO spends less time on admin

- Feels more focused and calm

- Has clear daily priorities

- Moves faster on key initiatives



Ideal Candidate

You likely have:

- 3+ years supporting a CEO, founder, or senior leader

- Experience in a startup, agency, or fast-paced environment

- Strong organisational and communication skills

- High proficiency with AI tools (ChatGPT, Notion AI, etc.)

- A proactive, solution-first mindset



Working Arrangement

- Freelance / contractor role

- 10–15 hours per week

- Flexible schedule

- Remote

- Opportunity to grow with the company



How to Apply, please submit:

1. A short introduction about yourself

2. Your experience supporting senior leaders

3. The AI tools you use regularly

4. One example of a system or process you built to save time

title: Content Moderation Specialist
description:
Content Moderation Specialist - Live Streaming Platforms



We're looking for Content Moderation Specialists to support live streaming platforms with chat moderation and broadcast monitoring.



___________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________



WHAT YOU'LL DO:



- Moderate chat interactions on live broadcasts

- Monitor broadcast quality and content compliance

- Enforce community guidelines

- Handle viewer reports and concerns

- Support technical stream operations

- Document issues and maintain standards



You work behind the scenes - NOT on camera. This is a support and moderation role for gaming, esports, and professional streaming platforms.



REQUIREMENTS:



Must have:

- Male, age 18-30 years old

- English communication skills

- Understanding of PC hardware and software

- Flexible schedule availability



Experience in streaming, moderation, or technical support is not required, but is desirable.



Your computer setup:

Since you'll be monitoring multiple streams and running specialized software, a decent gaming PC or modern workstation works best. Typically needs multi-core processor (6+ cores), dedicated graphics card (1060 6gb and above), 16GB memory, and stable 100+ Mbps internet. 



COMPENSATION



• Base salary + performance bonuses

• Full-time: $550-$770 USD/month

• Training: 2-3 days (paid daily)

• Probation: First 2 weeks (full pay)

• Payment: Weekly or bi-weekly, bank transfer



Flexible shifts: Morning / Day / Evening (night differential available)



TO APPLY:



Send message with:

1. Your name, age

2. Your processor (example: i5 11400 or Ryzen 5 3600)

3. Your graphics card (example: GTX 1660 or RX6000)

4. Your RAM amount (example: 16GB)

5. Internet speed (run speedtest)



Applications with complete info reviewed first!

title: Entry-Level Healthcare Virtual Assistant (full/part-time)
description:
APPLICATION PROCESS:

1.
 us your resume in PDF format only. Include all of the jobs you've worked at and the month + year. Do not leave anything off. Do not leave anything off.  You must provide an explanation of any gaps in your work history. Include the compensation you received for each job. Do not give us your hourly pay, only your annual compensation or total compensation.  If there is any gap in your resume without an explanation of the gap, you will be disqualified.



2.
 us a 60-second video of yourself answering the following question:

What are the 3 most important things that the company you work for MUST do to show you that they care about you? For example, if they don’t give me these 3 things then that means they don’t care about me. The video CANNOT EXCEED 60 seconds, or you will automatically be disqualified.



3. IMPORTANT: Please
 the above two items to 
 to follow the above instructions will result in automatic disqualifications.  Do not DM us or call us or contact us in any other way.



ABOUT OUR COMPANY:

Achieve Integrative Health is the #1 rated Acupuncture & Wellness Clinic in the United States with over 750 five star google reviews. Our Mission is to help people restore their body’s God given ability to heal itself so that they can do what they love. Our vision is to equip and inspire one million people around the world to do what they love, when they want, with whom they want. (
)



WHY JOIN US?

• You’ll Achieve your Goals = our team provides all of the resources (information, training, opportunities) you’ll need to achieve all of your Professional, Financial and Personal Goals, as long as you are willing to put in the work and deliver results.



• Peace and Joy Team = we have a phenomenal culture of care for our patients and our tea
mbers. We are very strict with our rules, policies and core values in order to protect our culture of peace and joy. We make sure tea
mbers who are not aligned with our core values exit our team so that they do not disrupt our peace and joy. Imagine being on a team where you don’t have to deal with people who talk behind your back and end up back stabbing you.



• Be Highly Rewarded as a Side Benefit = imagine being able to do your Passion everyday and make a phenomenal living as a side benefit. The average "experienced" VAs in the Philippines/Indonesia make $5-$7 USD/hr, our entry-level VAs start off making $5/hr. We have a quarterly bonus program, where some of our tea
mbers have earned $500-$1000USD per quarter, and this year 2025, because the team has performed so well, some tea
mbers were paid an 'additional' year end bonus of $2000-$3000 USD.



BENEFITS

• Competitive Total Compensation = $5-$12 USD/hr for graveyard shift only.

• Unlimited Opportunities for Growth = as long as you can generate more results for the company we will never limit your ability to grow within our company. Every tea
mber can also become a partner of the business if they desire.

• Other Benefits for qualified tea
mbers = paid-time off, premiu
dical insurance, Employee Savings Matching Program

• Work from Home = no more 2-4 hour commutes to work

• Wellness Initiatives = benefit from complimentary virtual health services from our medical providers, ensuring your well-being and your family’s well-being is always a priority.



JOB RESPONSIBILITIES

• Receive all inbound calls to close Leads wanting to receive treatments at our clinic

• Call,
, and use various communication forms to identify the validity and potential of the lead

• Receive all inbound calls to answer questions – fact find and qualify lead/route to appropriate tea
mber if needed

• Work with patients to ensure they are satisfied with the services provided

• Encourage happy patients to send us their success stories

• Share patient success stories during daily company meeting

• Implement our CARE system to follow-up with our patients to provide 5 star service

• Check-in and checkout patients

• Verify Insurance Benefits

• Other additional tasks may be added based on your strengths…



CHARACTER REQUIREMENTS & QUALIFICATIONS

• You must truly have a caring heart and truly want to help people improve their health, if you are mainly focused on how much money you can make, we are not the team for you

• You must speak Fluent English (ie. someone on the phone can understand what you're saying w/o straining)

• You must be organized and be able to handle multiple tasks and responsibilities everyday. If you’re looking to only do one or two tasks per day, we are the wrong team for you.

• You must be able to follow instructions exactly as written, if you don’t like reading or following instructions, we are not the right team for you

• You must have a good heart. If you like to gossip behind peoples back, please don’t apply.

• You must value Results over effort. If you like to be paid based on how many tasks you completed or how much responsibilities you have, we are not the team for you. We pay ONLY based on you meeting your KPIs, metrics, quotas.

• You must sleep the same schedule 7 days a week, as this is a graveyard shift, you cannot switch back to the Philippines time zone on the weekends as this destroys your health. Your Health is our priority, and if you don’t value your own health we don’t want you on our team.

• You must be honest and have integrity. If you are caught lying, you will be immediately terminated.

• You must want to EARN your pay (ie. base salary + bonuses) instead of being given a pay (ie. focused only on base salary) that you didn’t earn.



WORKSTATION REQUIREMENTS

• You must have a separate quiet room to work in. You can not have your children or anybody else in the room that you work as your screen will be displaying confidential information, no exceptions.

• There can not be any background noise in your room when you are making phone calls.

• You will be required to provide photos of your workspace

• We will also randomly ask you to show your workspace via your webcam, and if you are caught lying you will be fired immediately.



COMPUTER AND INTERNET REQUIREMENTS:

• Fast and reliable wired internet connection of not less than 100 Mbps

• Secondary and Tertiary Back up Internet of not less than 10 Mbps

• At least one Power Station Backup

• Dual Monitor

• Intel Core i3 or higher Operating System with at least 8gb RAM

• Excellent quality headset with microphone, and a working webcam



WORK SCHEDULE:

OPTION 1 > Full-time 8:00 - 18:00 (M-Th) 8:00-16:00 (F) U.S. Central Standard Time, 2-hr lunch breaks 

OPTION 2 > Part-time 7:00-13:00 (M-F) U.S. Central Standard Time 

OPTION 3 > Part-time 13:00-18:30 (M-F) U.S. Central Standard Time

title: Virtual Assistant – Marketing, Visibility & Executive Support
description:
Centric Business Solutions LLC is seeking a highly organized, proactive Virtual Assistant to support marketing, visibility, and executive administrative functions. This role is ideal for someone who thrives in a fast-paced, multi-project environment, enjoys working behind the scenes to elevate a brand, and can manage competing priorities with precision.

The Virtual Assistant will play a key role in expanding Centric’s visibility through social media management, award and recognition research, speaking engagement coordination, and general executive support.

________________________________________

Key Responsibilities

Marketing & Social Media

• Manage and schedule social media content across platforms (LinkedIn, Instagram, and others as assigned)

• Assist with content planning, captions, hashtags, and posting calendars

• Monitor engagement and flag opportunities for increased visibility

• Maintain consistency with Centric’s brand voice and messaging

________________________________________

Visibility, Awards & Recognition

• Research and identify industry awards, rankings, and recognition opportunities relevant to Centric and its founder

• Track deadlines, eligibility requirements, and submission criteria

• Assist with organizing application materials and timelines

• Maintain a visibility and awards calendar

________________________________________

Speaking Engagements & Thought Leadership

• Research speaking opportunities (conferences, panels, podcasts, webinars)

• Track calls for speakers and submission deadlines

• Assist with outreach, applications, and follow-ups

• Maintain a pipeline of speaking and media opportunities

________________________________________

Executive & Administrative Support

• Manage multiple projects simultaneously and track deliverables

• Maintain organized systems for documents, deadlines, and workflows

• Assist with scheduling, inbox support, and follow-ups as needed

• Support ad hoc administrative and operational tasks for the founder

________________________________________

Required Skills & Qualifications

• Proven experience as a Virtual Assistant, Executive Assistant, or Operations Assistant

• Exceptional organizational and time-management skills

• Ability to manage multiple projects concurrently without dropping details

• Strong written communication skills

• Comfort working independently and taking initiative

• Tech-savvy and confident using tools such as Google Workspace, project management tools (e.g., Asana, ClickUp, Trello), and social scheduling platforms

• Ability to maintain confidentiality and professionalism at all times

________________________________________

Preferred (Nice-to-Have)

• Experience supporting professional services firms (accounting, consulting, legal, etc.)

• Familiarity with award submissions, PR, or brand visibility work

• Social media or content coordination experience

• Interest in entrepreneurship, finance, or business growth

________________________________________

What Success Looks Like

• Social media content is consistently posted and aligned with brand goals

• Award and speaking opportunities are proactively identified and tracked

• Deadlines are met without reminders

• Systems are organized, updated, and easy to follow

• The founder’s time is freed up to focus on high-level work

________________________________________

title: Video Content & Podcast Editor
description:
Hello! I'm Jacob, the founder of Liverpool Podcast Studios, the UK's leading production studio creating world-class podcasts and content for founders, SMEs, charities, and creators. We deliver a high volume of client work every week and we do it through clear systems, consistent standards, and a calm, professional well established workflow. 



We're currently a small team of just 3, and we're now looking for the right person with the right values and skillset to join our growing team and work in an environment where you'll do the best work in your career! 



This role is ideal for someone who likes structure and consistency, communicates well, and wants the stability of working with one organised production company, not juggling lots of individual clients.



A personal note fro
, I'm looking for somebody who is the perfect fit, so please only apply if you think this role was absolutely made for you! 



**Important note**

Attention to detail is highly important to us, and so the first step of the application process is ensuring you have fully read the entire job description and followed all instructions clearly. We respect your time and we ask you do the same, so any mass applications will be disregarded.



What you’ll be doing

 • Editing multi-camera podcast and content sessions in Final Cut Pro

 • Processing projects through a repeatable workflow: file organisation, assembly

 • Colour correction / grading to a consistent standard

 • Audio mixing and repair when needed (clean-up, levelling, improving clarity for spoken-word)

 • Creating deliverables including:

 • full-length episodes (video + audio versions)

 • short-form clips for social

 • occasional promos, trailers, and format variations depending on the client

 • Following SOPs closely and helping improve them over time (we're always looking to get 1?tter every day!)



Requirements:

 • You take pride in your work, and desire to be the best at what you do!

 • Excellent proficiency in English and the ability to communicate clearly and confidently 

 • Strong proficiency in Final Cut Pro (we will provide you with a licensed version)

 • A keen ear for audio and the ability to adjust processing tools such as EQ, compression and noise reduction tools

title: New Jersey Contract, Offer & Compliance Support Specialist
description:

This is a process-driven, checklist-based role. You will be trained on our exact systems and expectations. Success in this role depends on your ability to follow procedures carefully, ask questions when information is missing, and ensure all documents are accurate before they are sent.



This role does not require making judgment calls or negotiating terms. Accuracy, organization, and consistency are critical.

Professional written English for
 communication

No documents may be sent without checklist completion

Questions must be escalated — guessing is not permitted

This role focuses on execution

We're currently a small team of just 3, and we're now looking for the right person with the right values and skillset to join our growing team and work in an environment where you'll do the best work in your career! 



This role is ideal for someone who likes structure and consistency, communicates well, and wants the stability of working with one organised production company, not juggling lots of individual clients.



A personal note fro

Requirements:

 • Strong proficiency in Final Cut Pro (we will provide you with a licensed version)

 • Highly reliable and consistent

?

title: Premium Outreach Specialist
description:
Our team is seeking a confident, sharp, and ambitious Lead Outreach Specialist (full-time) to support business growth at Yamammi, a fast-growing premium Influencer Marketing & UGC Agency based in Dubai, working with top lifestyle, beauty, wellness, hospitality, and luxury brands.



This role is for someone with proven experience in B2B outreach, lead generation, or sales outreach, who is confident communicating, understands premium positioning, and can represent the agency professionally.



You will work closely with the Founder, and be responsible for reaching out to the top brands in the UAE and worldwide, opening conversations with decision-makers, and help shape the growth of a fast-scaling agency from the inside.



JOB DETAILS:

- Proactively reach out to brands via
, LinkedIn, Instagram, and WhatsApp

- Write smart, personalized outreach messages (no copy-paste spam)

- Book intro calls and hand over qualified leads to the Founder

- Track outreach, replies, and statuses in Google Sheets

- Continuously improve outreach scripts, angles, and targeting

- Report daily/weekly on outreach activity and results



REQUIREMENTS:

- Fluent English (written & spoken) - mandatory

- Proven experience in lead outreach, B2B sales, lead generation, or similar

- Comfortable reaching out to high-end brands and decision-makers

- Strong written communication and persuasion skills

- Can work independently and take ownership

- Honest, reliable, and professional

- Good internet connection and quiet workspace



PROVIDED:

- Full onboarding and training on Yamammi outreach strategy 

- Verified Lead list for the Outreach

- Direct access to the Founder

- Structured outreach & tracking system

- High-performance, no-drama, ownership-driven culture

- Long-term growth into Senior Outreach / Brand Partnerships Lead

- Work inside a premium UAE-based influencer agency



HOURS:

- Full-time (min. 6 hours per day)

- Must overlap with Dubai working hours



RATE:

$350/month



HOW TO RESPOND:

1. Reply to this job post with a link (NB!) to your resume.

2. Write a short message (3–5 lines) about your experience in lead outreach / sales / B2B communication.

3. In your message, include the word “watermelon” at the beginning of your application so we know you pay attention to details.

title: InDesign Designer / Visual Storytelling Expert (Interior Design Booklet)
description:
We’re looking for a highly skilled InDesign (or similar) designer to transform an existing written guide into a polished, professional, high-end digital booklet (PDF).



The right person will understand the objective of the document, then use layout, typography, imagery, and visual hierarchy to reinforce the value being taught.



The guide teaches interior design principles related to visual perception, spatial illusion, and paint techniques, so design decisions must intentionally support those ideas.



Interior design experience (or strong familiarity with interior spaces) is strongly preferred.



What You’ll Be Working With



A fully written interior design guide (content is complete)

Clear educational intent: teaching how paint and color placement alter perceived space

The end product is a premium, downloadable PDF booklet (educational + brand-forward)



Responsibilities



Design a professional, cohesive booklet layout using Adobe InDesign

Establish strong visual hierarchy (headings, subheadings, callouts, diagrams, spacing)

Translate abstract concepts (depth, height, width, contrast, perception) into clear visual support

Source or create photo-realistic, high-quality imagery that:

Illustrates interior design concepts accurately

Matches the tone of a high-end interior design brand



Can include AI-generated images only if they are photo-realistic and professional

Ensure imagery reinforces what is being taught (not generic décor photos)

Apply consistent typography, spacing systems, and grid structure

Prepare final files for digital distribution (PDF)



Required Skills



Expert-level Adobe InDesign

Strong layout, typography, and editorial design skills

Ability to think conceptually and visually (not just execute instructions)

Experience sourcing or generating photo-realistic interior imagery (If needed, we can assist with this)

Excellent attention to detail and consistency

Ability to understand written content and translate meaning into visuals



Strongly Preferred



Background or experience in interior design, interior decorating, architecture, or real estate design

Experience designing:

Design guides

Lookbooks

Educational PDFs

Premium brand documents



Familiarity with visual storytelling and educational design

Comfort using AI image tools responsibly (Midjourney, DALL·E, etc.) with realism as a requirement



What We Care About Most:



You can look at written content and say:

“Here’s how the layout and visuals should reinforce this idea.”



You care about clarity, elegance, and intention

You can make a document feel premium, modern, and authoritative

description:
APPLICATION PROCESS:

 us your resume in PDF format only. Include all of the jobs you've worked at and the month + year. Do not leave anything off. Do not leave anything off. You must provide an explanation of any gaps in your work history. Include the compensation you received for each job. 2.
 us a 60-second video of yourself answering the following question:

What are the 3 most important things that the company you work for MUST do to show you that they care about you? For example, if they don’t give me these 3 things then that means they don’t care about me. The video CANNOT EXCEED 60 seconds, or you will automatically be disqualified.



3. IMPORTANT: Please
 the above two items to 
 to follow the above instructions will result in automatic disqualifications. Do not DM us or call us or contact us in any other way.



ABOUT OUR COMPANY:

Achieve Integrative Health is the #1 rated Acupuncture & Wellness Clinic in the United States with over 750 five star google reviews. Our Mission is to help people restore their body’s God given ability to heal itself so that they can do what they love. Our vision is to equip and inspire one million people around the world to do what they love, when they want, with whom they want. (
)



BENEFITS & COMPENSATION

* Competitive Total Compensation = $6-$12 USD/hr (base salary + bonuses)

* Unlimited Opportunities for Growth = as long as you can generate more results for the company we will never limit your ability to grow within our company. Every tea
mber can also become a partner of the business if they desire.

* Other Benefits for qualified tea
mbers = paid-time off, premiu
dical insurance, Employee Savings Matching Program

* Work from Home = no more 2-4 hour commutes to work

* Wellness Initiatives = benefit from complimentary virtual health services from our medical providers, ensuring your well-being and your family’s well-being is always a priority.

* everybody starts at $6 usd/hr during the first 3 months probation period.  The first 3 months we are testing your technical skills.

* After the first 3 months, your productions will be evaluated based on our standards of editing. We will rate your productions on a scale of 1 to 5. 5 is your productions are 100% in alignment with our standards of editing. 3 = your productions are 50% in alignment with our standards of editing. 1 = your productions are completely opposite of our standards of editing.

* a rating of 5 will result in your base salary increasing to $10/hr and you'll qualify to earn quarterly bonuses, giving you the potential to earn a total compensation of $15/hr.  (note: at this hourly rate, you will be required to produce 2x more than your first 3 months, more pay means more production requirements)

* a rating of 3 will result in no increase in base salary

* a rating of 1 will result in termination of employment



KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:

* Create and manage our shopify account to promote our e-commerce business

* Edit long form and short form videos daily for e-commerce and clinic and social media

* create & graphics for clinic projects and e-commerce business (eg t-shirt designs) 



TECHNICAL QUALIFICATIONS:

* We do not provide training for technical skills (multimedia editing, shopify) you are expected to already know how to do this

* you must have experience with Shopify and ecommerce sites

* must be able to edit videos & graphics quickly everyday

* must be highly organized as you will need to manage multiple tasks everyday



CHARACTER REQUIREMENTS:

• You must truly have a caring heart and truly want to help people improve their health, if you are mainly focused on how much money you can make, we are not the team for you

• You must be able to follow instructions exactly as written, if you don’t like reading or following instructions, we are not the right team for you

• You must have a good heart. If you like to gossip behind peoples back, please don’t apply.

• You must value Results over effort. If you like to be paid based on how many tasks you completed or how much responsibilities you have, we are not the team for you. We pay ONLY based on you meeting your KPIs, metrics, quotas.

• You must be honest and have integrity. If you are caught lying, you will be immediately terminated.

• You must want to EARN your pay (ie. base salary + bonuses) instead of being given a pay (ie. focused only on base salary) that you didn’t earn.



WORK SCHEDULE:

* Full-time = minimum of 40 hrs/wk.  You have the flexibility to choose your work hours, however, all tasks must be completed & submitted by 5am CST everyday M-F, and you required to attend our morning team huddles from 8:09am-8:45am cst M-F.



* Part-time = 20 hrs/wk. You have the flexibility to choose your work hours, however, all tasks must be completed & submitted by 5am CST everyday M-F, and you required to attend our morning team huddles from 8:09am-8:45am cst M-F.

title: Technical Support Specialist
description:
JavaScript is an absolute must for this role and will be tested during the interview process.




 automates data intake workflows for financial services companies in the United States. We’re looking for a JavaScript-focused developer to build, customize, and implement complex workflows on the Feathery platform for enterprise customers.



In this role, you’ll design and implement end-to-end workflows using our logic and rules engine, integrate with internal and third-party systems via APIs, and build solutions that move data reliably between platforms. You’ll work hands-on with JavaScript to customize behavior, manipulate data, and implement business logic beyond what standard configuration allows.



You’ll be working closely with customers and internal teams to build scalable solutions, troubleshoot issues in real-world implementations, and help design best practices for advanced use cases on the Feathery platform. This is a developer-first role focused on building and integration—not traditional technical support.

title: Lead List Building Specialist (Clay + Apollo Expert)
description:
Job Title

Lead Research & List Building Specialist — Clay + Apollo Expert (Full-Time)

Salary

$800–$1,200 USD/month (based on experience)

Schedule

Full-time, Monday–Friday, 40 hours/week. Flexible hours but must overlap with Eastern Standard Time (EST) for at least 3–4 hours daily.

About Us

Windsor Drake is a mergers & acquisitions (M&A) advisory firm based in Canada. We help founders of established businesses ($1M–$20M+ in revenue) sell their companies to qualified buyers. We are building a high-volume outbound sales machine and need someone exceptional to own our lead research and list building operations.

This is not a generic VA role. You will be the engine behind a 4-person outbound sales team. The quality of the lists you build directly determines whether our team books meetings or wastes their day calling the wrong people. If you're great at this, you'll have a massive impact on a fast-growing company.

What You'll Be Doing

Your core job is to build hyper-targeted, enriched lead lists of Canadian business owners and potential buyers using Clay, Apollo, and other research tools.

Specifically:



Build and maintain lead lists in Clay and Apollo targeting Canadian founders and business owners in specific sectors (manufacturing, HVAC, construction, healthcare services, tech, professional services, etc.)

Enrich every lead with: verified direct
, direct cell phone number, LinkedIn profile URL, company revenue estimate, employee count, years in business, founder tenure, business sector/industry

Cross-reference and verify data using LinkedIn Sales Navigator, company websites, government business registries, and other online sources

Segment and tag lists by geography (province/city), industry, revenue range, employee count, and founder characteristics

Clean and deduplicate data before importing to HubSpot CRM

Continuously test new data sources, Clay enrichment workflows, and Apollo search filters to improve list quality and hit rate

Track list performance metrics (which lists lead to the most booked meetings) and optimize accordingly

Research and identify potential buyer leads (private equity firms, strategic acquirers, family offices, search funds) targeting Canadian businesses



Tools You Must Know

Required — must have hands-on experience with:



Clay (building tables, enrichment workflows, waterfall enrichment, AI prompts within Clay, integrations)


 (advanced search filters, saved searches, list building, data export, sequence setup)

LinkedIn Sales Navigator (boolean search, lead lists, account lists)

HubSpot CRM (importing contacts, list management, custom properties, basic workflows)

Google Sheets / Excel (data cleaning, deduplication, VLOOKUP, formatting for CRM import)



Nice to have:



Experience with other enrichment tools (ZoomInfo, Clearbit, Lusha, RocketReach, BuiltWith, Crunchbase)

Familiarity with Canadian business databases (Industry Canada, provincial business registries)

Experience supporting outbound sales teams or SDR/BDR teams

Understanding of the M&A industry or business brokerage

Zapier or 
 for automating data flows



Who You Are



You are obsessed with data quality. You'd rather spend an extra 30 minutes verifying 50 leads than hand over a list with bad phone numbers and wrong
s. You take pride in clean, accurate data.

You are resourceful and creative. When Apollo doesn't have a phone number, you don't stop — you check Clay enrichment, LinkedIn, the company website, Canada411, provincial registries, whatever it takes to find it.

You are organized and systematic. You build repeatable processes, not one-off lists. You document your workflows so they can scale.

You can work independently. We'll give you targeting criteria and you'll go build the lists without needing to be micromanaged.

You communicate clearly. If a list isn't coming together well or you're hitting dead ends in a sector, you tell us proactively — not after wasting 3 days.

You understand that your work directly impacts revenue. When you deliver a great list, our team books meetings. When the list is bad, they waste their day. You take that seriously.



What Success Looks Like

Within your first 30 days:



You've built Clay workflows for our top 3 target sectors

You've delivered your first 500+ enriched, verified leads to HubSpot

Our outbound team is calling your lists and booking meetings



Within 90 days:



You've built a repeatable system for producing 1,000+ new enriched leads per month across multiple sectors and geographies

You're tracking which list segments convert best and proactively recommending where to focus

You've identified and tested at least 2–3 new data sources or enrichment methods beyond Apollo and Clay

Our team never runs out of people to call



How to Apply

Do NOT send a generic application. We will ignore it.

Instead, send us a short Loom video (3–5 minutes max) where you:



Show us a Clay table you've built for a previous client or project — walk us through the enrichment workflow you set up, what data sources you used, and why

Show us an Apollo search you've built — explain the filters you chose and how you'd refine it for targeting Canadian business owners with $2M–$10M in revenue

Tell us one thing most people get wrong about lead list building and what you do differently



If you don't have Clay experience but are very strong in Apollo + LinkedIn Sales Navigator and are confident you can learn Clay quickly, still apply — but be honest about it in your video.

Applications without a Loom video will not be reviewed.

Why This Role Is Different

This isn't data entry. This isn't scraping random
s. You'll be the person who determines which Canadian founders our team talks to every single day. The data you build becomes a long-term strategic asset for our company. You'll work directly with the founder (not through 3 layers of management), get real feedback on how your lists perform, and have a clear line of sight between your work and the company's growth.

If you're the kind of person who gets excited about building the perfect lead list and seeing it convert into real business, we want to talk to you.
